summary: A Native American warrior called Navajo Joe seeks revenge on a gang of sadistic outlaws who has massacred the people of his tribe.
cast: Burt Reynolds|Aldo Sambrell|Nicoletta Machiavelli|Fernando Rey|Tanya Lopert|Franca Polesello|Lucia Modugno|Pierre Cressoy|Roberto Paoletti|Nino Imparato|Lucio Rosato|Valeria Sabel|Mario Lanfranchi|Ángel Álvarez|Rafael Albaicín|Lorenzo Robledo|Álvaro de Luna|Valentino Macchi|Cristina Iosani|Gianni Di Stolfo|Simón Arriaga|Cris Huerta|Ángel Ortiz|Roderik Auguste|Dyanik Zurakowska|Fortunato Arena|Lars Bloch|Juan Cazalilla|Luciano Foti|Enrique Santiago|José Terrón
title: Joe, el implacable
